reviews.text:
### Emotion Detection Module

The Emotion Detection Module enables real-time sentiment scoring during live chat sessions, analyzing each message and updating sentiment labels—**positive**, **neutral**, or **negative**—every 2 seconds.
reviews.reason_text: Enables real-time sentiment scoring with specified update frequency.

reviews.text: This empowers support teams with instant emotional insights to guide tone, escalation, and prioritization strategies.

The underlying NLP model is optimized for high accuracy, targeting **≥88% F1 score on English** text, and is undergoing phased expansion for **multilingual sentiment analysis** as part of our 2025 roadmap.
reviews.reason_text: Mentions model accuracy but no explicit enforceable action.

reviews.text: In the UI, sentiment badges appear beside each message, color-coded for quick reference.
reviews.reason_text: Describes UI changes without enforceable action.

reviews.text: A **trend line graph** visualizes the sentiment trajectory across the session, while a **negative sentiment alert** is triggered when **more than 3 consecutive negative messages** are detected—enabling proactive intervention by agents or escalation bots.
reviews.reason_text: Triggers negative alerts and visualizes sentiment trajectory.

reviews.text: All data is processed **exclusively on on-premise GPUs** to ensure compliance with **GDPR Article 28**, keeping **personally identifiable information (PII) onshore** and under full client control.
reviews.reason_text: Mentions GDPR compliance but no enforceable action.

reviews.text: The next key milestone is the **pilot release scheduled for 2025-05-15**, which will be available as an **opt-in module** in the admin console.
reviews.reason_text: Pilot release scheduled as opt-in module.

reviews.text: This ensures flexibility for client-specific rollout plans and compliance workflows.
reviews.reason_text: Ensures flexibility for client plans and compliance.
